Class CurrencyModel

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    A model object that will hold all the necessary information that will be shown on the GUI.

      • CurrencyModel

        CurrencyModel(android.net.Uri countryFlagIconUri,
              String currencyCode,
              String currencyName,
              BigDecimal currencyRate)
        The main constructor of this class.
        Parameters:
        countryFlagIconUri - Uri - The country flag icon file Uri.
        currencyCode - String - The 3 letter currency code that will used.
        currencyName - String - The currency name, which will be shown.
        currencyRate - BigDecimal - The currency rate of the currency pair with the base currency.
